content.text:
Let me analyze the target structure and provide step-by-step instructions to build it.

Analysis of the Main Target Image:
- The structure has 4 main blocks
- It consists of 3 layers
- Base layer: Two vertical green blocks (pillars)
- Middle layer: One horizontal yellow rectangular block connecting the green pillars
- Top layer: One vertical orange cylindrical block with a yellow curved cap

Block Selection and Assembly Order:
The structure requires:
- 2 vertical green blocks (block index 2 and 3)
- 1 horizontal yellow rectangular block (block index 7)
- 1 vertical orange cylindrical block (block index 10)
- 1 yellow curved cap (block index 12)

Assembly Instructions:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 2
    Step2: Move block with index 3
    Step3: Move block with index 7
    Step4: Move block with index 10
    Step5: Move block with index 12
}

This will create the structure starting from the base green pillars, adding the horizontal yellow connector, placing the orange cylindrical block on top, and finally capping it with the yellow curved piece.
